data.title: The location of John Adams Birth and Death
data.meta_description: Visiting the birthplace and gravesite of two presidents in one stop was the perfect history snack on our North East road trip! John Adams and John Quincy Adams are both buried in Quincy, Massachusetts...with their birthplaces right down the road! Learn something? ðŸŽ¥ Donate a cup of coffee to a tank of gas.
